meanings.sent1: Her unresponsivenesses to my questions made me feel ignored.
meanings.sent2: The doctor noted the patient's unresponsivenesses to stimuli.
meanings.sent3: The unresponsivenesses of the cat to the laser pointer was both frustrating and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The unresponsivenesses of the old computer system was like trying to communicate with a brick wall.
meanings.sent5: The unresponsivenesses of the audience during the boring presentation was palpable.

meanings.sent1: The unresponsivenesses of the teenager worried his parents.
meanings.sent2: The unresponsivenesses of the machine indicated a malfunction.
meanings.sent3: The unresponsivenesses of the sleepy toddler was adorable yet concerning.
meanings.sent4: The unresponsivenesses of the frozen computer screen mirrored my own mental block.
meanings.sent5: The unresponsivenesses of the customer service representative was frustrating for the customers.
